Multivariable Calculus | A special double integral.

a special double integral\n[imath]\begin{array}{l}\n\iint_{R} f(x) g(y) d A=\left(\int_{a}^{b} f(x) d x\right)\left(\int_{c}^{d} g(y) d y\right) \\\nR=[a, b] \times[c, d]\n\end{array}[/imath][imath]\iint_{R} f(x) g(y) d A=\left(\int_{a}^{b} f(x) d x\right)\left(\int_{c}^{d} g(y) d y\right) [/imath] [imath]R=[a, b] \times[c, d][/imath]
